messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Chianca column on unschooling (xpost from AU)
messages.msgSnippet: Thanks, Nancy. I was into the fourth line of what you wrote below before I knew it wasn t building up to But this time you ve gone too far; you suck!  I
messages.messageBody:
Thanks, Nancy.

I was into the fourth line of what you wrote below before I knew it
wasn't building up to "But this time you've gone too far; you suck!"

<g>
I was relieved. <g>

And you're welcome for that website. I have a lot of fun with it and
I'm grateful to the dozens or over a hundred people who have said
"Sure! Cool!" when I asked if I could enshrine something they had
written there, and to the other several dozen who were told after the
fact and didn't say "No way, pull it" and even to those who've
written goofy stuff I wouldn't pull if they got a lawyer to come to
my house (that would be this page: http://sandradodd.com/strew/ifilet )
I didn't name them, and many-to-most have changed their views since
then anyway.

Sandra


On Feb 25, 2006, at 8:25 AM, barndogzzz@... wrote:

> **Sandra,
> I normally read and learn here at this group. I felt a need to
> respond to
> this one. Your responses always seem to be fair, "gracious," and
> logical .....and
> sometimes I get a chuckle from the things you say.:o) For me, this
> is all of
> the above. What we do IS funny compared to school! We're laughing
> WAY more
> than when the kids went to school! I am enjoying the wealth of
> knowledge from
> your website also.
>
> Thanks!
> Nancy

messages.subject: Fwd: [AlwaysLearning] Chianca column on unschooling (xpost from AU)
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 2/23/2006 4:13:26 PM Eastern Standard Time, ... **Sandra, I normally read and learn here at this group. I felt a need to respond to this
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 2/23/2006 4:13:26 PM Eastern Standard Time,
Sandra@... writes:


> Freedom of the press.
> Making a big deal out of it lacks realism and graciousness.
>
> What we do *IS* funny, compared to school.
>
> Sandra
>
>
**Sandra,
I normally read and learn here at this group. I felt a need to respond to
this one. Your responses always seem to be fair, "gracious," and logical .....and
sometimes I get a chuckle from the things you say.:o) For me, this is all of
the above. What we do IS funny compared to school! We're laughing WAY more
than when the kids went to school! I am enjoying the wealth of knowledge from
your website also.

Thanks!
Nancy



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
